assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Vardhman Textiles Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells textiles and fibre in India, the United States, Europe, rest of Asia, and internationally. The company manufactures yarns, fabrics, fibers, threads, and garments. It offers specialized greige and dyed yarns in cotton, polyester, acrylic, and various blends; and value added products, such as organic cotton, melange, core spun yarns, ultra yarns, gassed mercerized, super fine yarns, slub and cellulose yarns, and fancy yarns for hand knitting. It also engages in lending and investing activities; and manufacture and sale of steel products, including hot rolled bars, and special and alloy steel for automotive, engineering, bearing, and allied industries. The company also exports its products. The company was formerly known as Mahavir Spinning Mills Limited and changed its name to Vardhman Textiles Limited in September 2006. Vardhman Textiles Limited was founded in 1965 and is headquartered in Ludhiana, India.
